elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Rephrase the fake questions into real ones.

elements.name: question9
elements.title: Are you enjoying your apprenticeship so far?
elements.correctAnswer: How do you like the apprenticeship so far?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Do you also think that we are quite well supported by the training company?
elements.correctAnswer: How do you find the support from the training company?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Do you also think that wages should be higher in the first year of an apprenticeship?
elements.correctAnswer: What do you think about the salary in the first year of the apprenticeship?

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Rephrase the fake questions into real ones.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Do you have good lessons at vocational school?
elements.correctAnswer: What is teaching like at the vocational school?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Do you already know some of your colleagues better?
elements.correctAnswer: Which colleagues do you already know better?

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: Rephrase the fake questions into real ones.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Do you think it is realistic that we will pass the final exam?
elements.correctAnswer: How do you feel about the final exam?

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Have you already thought about your professional future?
elements.correctAnswer: How do you see your professional future?
